html:
10.1.17  2:47 pm   I know you probably get asked a lot about this but.... what inspired you to start making such original content?

     because it was in my mind for a long time and i was going to explode

10.1.17  2:04 pm   Do you think you'll ever utilise bagpipes in your music? 

     probably not but maybe

10.1.17  2:03 pm   favourite kind of women?

     intelligent

10.1.17  1:46 pm   Wurtz the most important thing in life?

     probably sexual reproduction

10.1.17  1:44 pm   what is the dumbest question you have ever received?

     they are all tied for the smartest

10.1.17  1:10 pm   Bill, can you please tell why it's like this and not like that?

      well my question to you is why would it be like that

10.1.17  1:03 pm   What makes you make the content you make?

     i usually just make myself make it

10.1.17  12:23 pm   have you ever sat at those tables outside starbucks in new canaan? Have you ever pet someones dog there?

     that is where i wrote some of the new canaan song. i think those lines were re-written later, but they preserved the fact that i was there. i tried to make it clear that i was sitting there

10.1.17  12:17 pm   If you could classsify your humour what catagory would you be in 

     ah, humour classification. my favourite passed time

10.1.17  11:13 am   Wait just kidding I actually don't know the time signature of I wanna be a movie star what is it

     7.5.17 12:49 am

10.1.17  10:48 am   What other license plates do you love besides pennsylvania

     i have never said i love pennsylvania license plates

10.1.17  10:48 am   What even is the time signature in outside I am dumb

     it's all 4 except a couple of dropped beats in transitions

10.1.17  10:46 am   how did you get the idea of how to start HOTEWIG cuz i think its brilliant

     i just started from a simple perspective of what it seems like to live on this planet. i also was trying to make sure to keep it weirder than history of japan, because history of japan had almost sent the wrong message that i am an "educational channel" so i wanted to make sure to have lots of fun and get crazy

10.1.17  10:35 am   What is

     anything

10.1.17  8:16 am   Whats your favourite mode?

     special mode!!!!

10.1.17  7:32 am   Every piec of your musical content(songs/instrumentals/jazz) is in the mp3 format, but "apple juice"(the song, not video) is in the aiff format. Why?

     i guess i forgot to convert it, but it doesn't really make a difference in the load time because it's so short anyway. but thank you for reminding me, i should switch it for consistency

10.1.17  7:09 am   hillary or trump

     what is the 2016 united states presidential election

10.1.17  6:03 am   what degree of stupidity are you prepared to tolerate?

     try me

10.1.17  5:23 am   Why did you switch to 3/4 for one bar in the first and third pre-chorus of Outside and not the second one?

     sometimes transition sections like this can be very sensitive. i don't want it to feel like an odd bar, but i also need to not waste time, and move it along promptly. perhaps you could say i didn't want to be late

10.1.17  4:38 am   i wanna ask you a question but it's not that i have a particular question to ask you, i just want to be replied to
so
what's the funniest word you've ever heard

     'mature' when they pronounce it 'matoore.' it's the funniest when you're not expecting it

10.1.17  4:04 am   why does the universe even exist, anyway?

     everything imaginable happens

10.1.17  2:25 am   is there a large backlog of questions or are there very few?

     there are thousands of questions unanswered, but it's not really a backlog because i've skipped them
10.1.17  2:23 am   the title is mispelled. it says ueqstions.

10.1.17  1:58 am   do you consider yourself a philosopher?

     i say cut out the middle man, and just do the thinking

      i've always thought of "hi i'm steve" as a quite philosphical video in its message (the one i found in it anyway) but here you always just seem to talk about expressing yourself. what does "expressing yourself" mean to you?

     doing things that are seen and/or heard by others

10.1.17  1:54 am   How long do you plan on making your videos?

     for now i think i would generally like to keep them between 30 seconds and 4 minutes, with songs being no longer than 3:30

10.1.17  1:22 am   Why does the 'questions' heading misspell the word questions? Also how do you feel about internet grammar?

      now you can send grammar all over the world

10.1.17  1:20 am   so I'm a singer/guitarist and I'm working on an arrangement of "I love you", my current favorite of your songs.  is there a reason you cursed guitarists by writing in Eb?  

     i don't use guitars so i'm not obligated to write in guitar keys. i use whatever key is best for the vocal. but i think you're gonna want to use D with capo 1

10.1.17  12:33 am   do you remember me

     who is this

10.1.17  12:30 am   Images appear to move very musically in your videos. Can you elaborate on the way you make your video synchronize rhythmically with your sound? I imagine it's very hard to make the visual rhythm of the images FEEL in lockstep with the musical rhythm. I wonder how much the visual rhythm informs our experience of the audio rhythm? 

     that part is actually very easy for me. timing has been my strong point since a very young age. and i find it is a very powerful tool and makes the sound come alive when the video moves to match it

10.1.17  12:24 am   How to tell Zebras apart from other striped animals like okapis, tigers, chipmunks, skunks etc.

     zebras are the ones that look like horses

10.1.17  12:10 am   Hi Bill! Sorry if you're tired of getting hotewig questions.. but I'd like to know more about your thought process/goals for writing the intro part. After the big bang, there's pretty much a straightforward story line for you to follow (if you can call the history of the world straightforward)... but everything from "hi, you're on a rock..." up until "i think there's a universe now" must've been really tricky to write. The origin of the universe (and history of the universe) seems like a real tough story to set the scene for. Did you find it hard to come up with a good intro for the video? (Btw I think you nailed it).

     that was probably the most fun part. explaining the motivations for a universe happening, from the perspective of there not being a universe. and it's really common sense, i think, if you look at it from the right perspective, but the problem is you are not allowed to properly use time or space in the description because those things only exist if there is a universe. and most language as we know it is based on time and space. so it makes for some thrilling turns of phrase





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

     i will try

     no

     E over B, and B

     it is a wonderful word, unappreciated in its time

     yes

     probablly best to use both, in most music

      and what was the driving force for making the history of the world vids?

     i don't remember

     what should i have called it

9.30.17  8:17 pm   piano or violin

     i think you forgot the attachment i see neither

9.30.17  8:09 pm   have you made a video on pizza yet

     yes

9.30.17  7:54 pm   twitter or facebook?

     this is actually my own website

9.30.17  7:40 pm   how long does it take to make one of the usual 5-8 seconds videos

     videos of that length have not been usual for me since 2015

9.30.17  7:40 pm   would you use green screen technology in future videos

     yes but unfortunately i don't have that technology yet

9.30.17  7:19 pm   are you high or drunk or both

     no

9.30.17  7:11 pm   does getting popular fast give you a good feeling 

     i'm not sure what that would feel like. so far i've gotten popular at a medium pace

9.30.17  7:08 pm   Can you make some instrumentals?

     i prefer when music has words or video to go with it

      I need it for a video, ill give you credits.

     i prefer to make music for my own videos. and if it's for other people's videos i prefer to do the music after the video, but i'm not looking for that type of work right now and i would probably charge way too much anyway

     Make some for "Im Steve", "What is love?" and "old mcdonald".

     ? but those videos already have music

     

If you do it Ill love you for life <3

9.30.17  7:08 pm   are you just getting started on everything?

     oh hell yeah

9.30.17  7:07 pm   In the music video for outside, what did the criminal do to become a criminal?

     spent hours in hair and makeup, i assume

9.30.17  7:04 pm   idea: add another question box next to this one.

     ok i will do it when i get a chance

9.30.17  6:59 pm   let's just guess you received 100 questions a day on the questions forum.

     it's actually several hundred

      how many of those questions do you answer?

     all the questions i've answered can be seen (or counted) on this page
